MAN.TITLE: loadwave
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: load a sound wav file into scilab

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a string. The path of the wav file to be loaded
: a matrix one line for each channel

DESCRIPTION.P: Reads a .wav sound file into Scilab as a matrix. If y is given, it is filled with information about the samples (See the message sent by loadwave).
